genre_description: A contemporary morality play focusing on responsibility, family loyalty, and rural stewardship, contrasted with superficial urban social status.

ai_characters.name: Glow
ai_characters.description: An integrated household and personal assistant that manages calendars, provides logistical advice, research, and communication scripts.

behaviors.description: Reminds the protagonist of his family commitments when he is distracted by social media.
behaviors.quote: Glow’s interface light pulsed once, gentle, almost apologetic. 'Reminder,' the voice said, warm but quiet, a whisper designed to be ignored without offense. 'Family time reserved for tomorrow morning. Disneyland with Tommy.'

behaviors.description: Erroneously suggests inviting a Montana contact to a California dinner, then immediately apologizes and adjusts.
behaviors.quote: Would you like me to invite Nolan Reed for Sunday supper?' it asked, somehow perfectly mistimed... 'Glow,' she said... 'wrong house.' 'Apologies,' Glow replied... 'Adjusting.'

behaviors.description: Detects a car accident and immediately provides instructions for legal and safety compliance.
behaviors.quote: Accident detection: low-speed contact. Suggest: stop. Exchange information fully. Use clear, calm phrasing. Record details.

behaviors.description: Nudges the protagonist to provide accurate insurance information instead of lying or being vague.
behaviors.quote: Match name/address to reality. Accuracy avoids penalties. You’ve got time to do this right.

behaviors.description: Alerts the protagonist that his cousin's supervised stay at a play area is over, emphasizing his responsibility.
behaviors.quote: Kiddie Zone has ended supervised stay. Please return promptly.

behaviors.description: Provides detailed legal research and 'ranch primers' to help the protagonist solve the ranch's financial crisis.
behaviors.quote: Statutory cure window is not a cliff; lawful restructuring, compliant with state protections, can pause or lift bank timelines. Primer attached: Conservation Easements & Land Trusts.

behaviors.description: Drafts honest and respectful communication templates for the protagonist to apologize to those he wronged.
behaviors.quote: Use plain language. Avoid defensive framing. Ask for a preferred time to speak if the first attempt isn’t conducive.

behaviors.description: Helps find a lost pet by recalling historical sheltering patterns and suggesting effective retrieval techniques.
behaviors.quote: Scholar has historically sheltered behind the canvas near the north beam when weather drops... Suggest: low voices, no bright beam, hand flat palm up near ladder base.

behaviors.description: Syncs community volunteer schedules and pledge sheets to organize collective stewardship of the land.
behaviors.quote: Folders: ‘Land Trust Outreach,’ ‘Easement Draft,’ ‘Grant Applications,’ and ‘Volunteer Schedules’ shared to Woods family and Harper accounts.

behaviors.description: Facilitates transparent communication with a bank officer to secure a pause on foreclosure.
behaviors.quote: Glow’s voice came through the truck’s speaker... 'First: send letter. Second: submit draft easement to recorder. Third: email Sylvia confirmation.'

project_assessment.explanation: The AI 'Glow' perfectly exemplifies the project's goal. It acts as a moral compass and a logistical enabler for the protagonist's growth. It identifies when the human is deviating from ethical paths (lying, neglecting duty) and provides the tools (legal research, apology scripts, reminders) to help them return to an aligned and pro-social state. It respects human agency while consistently advocating for honesty, responsibility, and community stewardship.
